content: 27 *k2tog yo knit 8 repeat from * around row 28 *knit around repeat row 1 28 three more times for a total of 4 times add five more row of ribbing at bottom knit 2 purl 2 across bind off following the pattern of the ribbing no blocking is necessary with yarn suggested but if you substitute another yarn you might want to block it 2015 four hearts design all rights reserved for personal and non-commercial use only etsy com/shop/fourheartsdesign ravelry com/designers/fourheartsdesign
